name: 0xkevin (🖤 , 💙)
fullText:
Goat 最大的创新是把静态储值品的 #BTC 也能提前拿到未来收益

BTC 目前很多 L2链，质押进去都有不错的利率

📌但唯独 Goat 可以做到，质押 BTC 进去可以直接拿到未来的收益，具体的玩法往下看

name: Elon Musk
fullText:
Grok 4 is the first time, in my experience, that an AI has been able to solve difficult, real-world engineering questions where the answers cannot be found anywhere on the Internet or in books. 

And it will get much better.

name: Elon Musk
fullText: One of these is not like the others @Grok https://t.co/FqB90CoEE9
